settings.title: What can I expect after I’ve placed my order?
settings.answer: After placing your order, a confirmation with your order details will be sent to you by email. If you do not receive the conformation email, please contact our Solgaard support team at info@solgaard.co

settings.title: Can I add items to my existing order?
settings.answer: We are unable to amend an order once it’s been confirmed. We suggest creating a new order and notify our Solgaard support team to combine your orders into one shipment at the warehouse. Please note: If the order is placed 15 minutes after the first order it might not be possible to combine the shipment.

settings.title: I’m getting an error during checkout that says my card is declined
settings.answer:
1. Make sure the address you are using is the same as the address on file with the bank. Billing address inconsistencies will cause your credit card to be declined. You should confirm that the billing information you’ve entered matches with what is on file for you with your credit card issuing bank. Please note! Declined transactions will appear on your billing statement as pending transactions. These pending transactions are deducted from your account balance temporarily and will clear from your account within 5 days. These funds are not held by Solgaard Design and the pending status can only be removed by your bank.
  2. The decline of your credit card could also be caused by insufficient funds on the credit card.

settings.title: Is it possible to cancel my order?
settings.answer: You are able to cancel you order, entirely or partially, within 15 minutes’ after you have placed it. If you which to do so, you must send an email to info@solgaard.co with subject line: Order cancelation #[order number] The order will be locked 15 minutes after placing it, as the order will be prepared for shipping from our warehouses. In case you still want a refund you will be responsible for any return cost. Furthermore, we will charge you for the cost associated with the shipment of the order (e.g. shipment, handling fee by warehouse), no matter what shipping cost there are attached to the order. And will thus subtract these when refunding your order.

settings.title: Can I return an item for a refund?
settings.answer:
In order to return your purchase, the returned items must be unopened, unworn, unwashed, or otherwise unused with original tags/labels attached. If you request a refund, the purchase price (excluding delivery charges) will be refunded to you using the original payment method, once we have received the returned item back and confirmed that it meets conditions above. You are able to refund your purchase up to 7 days after you receive it.

When returning your order, you will be responsible for any costs associated with returning the item to us including shipping cost, any currency conversion and/or local or international taxes or duties.

When refunding you order, entirely or partially, you can send the product(s) to the consignor of the original shipping label. 

If you have any questions to the cancelation or return of your order, please contact our customer support team.

settings.title: How soon will my order be shipped?
settings.answer:
Your order will be shipped as soon as possible. Typically, this means within 1-2 business day. The shipping time frame will be approximately 5-7 business days.

If the item was on backorders we will ship your order as soon as we have the product available in stock.

settings.title: What countries are you able to ship to?
settings.answer: Currently, we are shipping to following countries: United States Canada Hong Kong Australia New Zeeland Countries in Europe: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, UK, Norway and Switzerland If you do not see your country listed, please contact us at: info@solgaard.co

settings.title: How soon will I receive my order?
settings.answer:
Please note that delivery dates are estimates only provided by the courier. National holidays and some geographic regions can affect delivery times.

The shipping time frame will be approximately 5-7 business days. If you have not received your bag within 7 business days, please contact our customer support team.

settings.title: Can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships you will receive a confirmation by email with a link to your tracking number. If you have a Solgaard Design account, this link will also be available in the Order History section of your account menu. You can see the current status and location of your shipment, find out if your shipment has been delivered and who signed for it by copying and pasting your tracking number on TNT’s Track and Trace page.

settings.title: Do you deliver to PO box addresses?
settings.answer: Currently the couriers we use typically prefer to deliver with a signature upon receipt. When going through the checkout process you can select a preferred shipping vendor if you know which you prefer to use.

settings.title: I missed my delivery, how can I rearrange it?
settings.answer:
Your best option is to arrange delivery directly with the courier who will leave a note in your mailbox or at your door when they tried to deliver you package. 

If you do not have your tracking number feel free to contact our customer service.

settings.title: I haven’t received a confirmation page by email.
settings.answer: Please double check to make sure the confirmation email didn’t end up in your spam mail or junk folder. You may want to save our email to your contacts to prevent this in the future. If you have created a Solgaard Design account, you can view your order details, status and history under the Recent Orders section in the account menu. If you have not received an order confirmation or cannot view your order from your account page, please contact the Solgaard Design through our support ticket to look into this for you. On the support request form, please select “An Order I placed” then “Check-out & Billing”.

settings.title: What do I do if a parcel is lost?
settings.answer:
If your parcel is lost please contact the Solgaard Support team at: info@solgaard.co 

We will then check with the courier and if it is not possible to recover we make sure a replacement order is sent to you as quickly as possible. 

Please note: damaged or missing merchandise must be reported to us within 24 hours of the date of delivery. Failure to do so may result in the claim being denied by the shipping carrier and exclusion from our return/exchange policy.

settings.title: What do I do if my parcel is damaged?
settings.answer:
Please check the condition of your parcel before you sign for it. If it's at all damaged, don't sign for it and hand it back to the courier to return to us. If you only discover that your parcel is damaged after it is delivered, please contact the Solgaard Support team at info@solgaard.co 

Please note: damaged or missing merchandise must be reported to us within 24 hours of the date of delivery. Failure to do so may result in the claim being denied by the shipping carrier and exclusion from our return/exchange policy.

settings.title: Warranty Instructions
settings.answer:
Please review Solgaard warranty details, below.
  1. Warranty inspection and service is arranged through and approved by Solgaard Support.
  2. If you think you may require warranty service, please contact us by submitting a support request.
  3. Warranty services are given priority and will be processed within 4 business days upon receipt of device by the Solgaard team.
  4. Please note: Solgaard Design is not responsible for lost packages if your package does not have any tracking information.

settings.title: Solgaard product Warranty Details
settings.answer:
We provide one year of warranty and we warrant that:
  • a) the product will be delivered undamaged in the quantities ordered; and
  • b) the product will conform with the manufacturer's latest published instructions as set out on the website or in our product material at the time of your order.
The product is intended to be used strictly in accordance with the manufacturer's latest published instructions as set out on the site or on the product itself. It is your responsibility to ensure that you use the product strictly in accordance with those instructions. We try very hard to deliver products in excellent condition. However, if you tell us that the product is faulty, you agree to keep the product in its current condition available for us (or our agent) to inspect within a reasonable time. If your product has any defects, please send and email to our customer service to info@solgaard.co. We recommend that you attach pictures and/or videos of the problem in order to shorten the processing time. In order to provide you with any remedies for a faulty product, we may need your assistance and prompt provision of certain information regarding the product, including:
  • a) you specifying with reasonable detail the way in which it is alleged that the product is damaged or defective; and
  • b) you providing us with the delivery note number and such other information as we reasonably require.
If you would like us to repair, replace or provide a refund for the product where it did conform to the applicable contract, and we find that the product has:
  • (a) been misused, abused or subjected to neglect, improper or inadequate care, carelessness, damage or abnormal conditions; or
  • (b) been involved in any accident or damage caused by an incorrect attempt at modification or repair; or
  • (c) been dealt with or used contrary to our or the manufacturer's instructions for the product; or
  • (d) eteriorated through normal wear and tear,
After delivery to us, we may at our discretion decide not to repair, replace or refund you for the product and/or we may require you to pay all reasonable carriage costs and servicing costs at our current standard fees and costs and charge this to your credit or debit card, or the payment details that you provided to us when you made your order, and, to the extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable to you for any losses, liabilities, costs, damages, charges or expenses as a result.

settings.title: Exclusions and Limitations
settings.answer:
The Limited Warranty applies only to products manufactured by Solgaard Design. That can be identified by the “Solgaard Design trademark, trade name, or logo affixed to them and purchased at an authorized retailer, serviced by an authorized Solgaard Design distributor.

The Limited Warranty does not apply to any non-Solgaard products.

This warranty does not apply to (a) damage caused by accident, abuse, misuse, flood, fire, earthquake, acts of piracy, or other external causes; (b) damage caused by operating the product outside the permitted or intended use as described by Solgaard; (c) a product or part that has been modified to alter functionality or capability; (d) cosmetic damage, including but not limited to scratches, dents, and broken plastic.

Important: Warranty applies to original end-user purchaser only and is non-transferable. Warranty does not apply should you purchase through a 3rd party reseller such as eBay and Craigslist. Solgaard Design warranties only apply to devices purchased at any authorized retailer serviced by an authorized Solgaard distributor. For questions regarding authorized retailers, please contact us.

Intentionally opening up or disassembling your device in any way will void your warranty.

settings.title: Return Policy
settings.answer:
Please carefully research the product you are interested in before purchasing. 

Devices purchased through an authorized retailer cannot be refunded by Solgaard Design. If you would like additional information about any of our Solgaard Design products, freely contact us. Our experienced support and tech team here at Solgaard Design are happy to help you make the right decision!

In order to return your purchase, the returned items must be unopened, unworn, unwashed, or otherwise unused with original tags/labels attached. If you request a refund, the purchase price (excluding delivery charges) will be refunded to you using the original payment method, once we have received the returned item back and confirmed that it meets conditions above. You are able to refund your purchase up to 7 days after you receive it.

You will be responsible for any costs associated with returning the item to us including shipping cost, any currency conversion and/or local or international taxes or duties.

When refunding you order, entirely or partially, you can send the product(s) to the consignor of the original shipping label.

settings.title: Counterfeiting
settings.answer:
The fight against unauthorized sales and counterfeiting is a long-term commitment to quality and service by Solgaard Design. Solgaard Design is dedicated to ensuring our customers receive the modern technologies, beautiful design and world-class support that encompass the brand. 

Solgaard Design advises consumers to be cautious when purchasing devices from unauthorized resellers as the quality, reliability and safety of these products is uncertain and in some cases, may expose the user to serious dangers not encountered with genuine Solgaard Design products.

Solgaard Design has deployed a devoted team to actively pursue and investigate unauthorized resellers and counterfeiters in an effort to protect customers and business partners. By finding counterfeiters and taking legal action against them, we believe we're doing our part since many people do not understand the global ramifications of counterfeiting, or the cycle of abuse they are supporting when purchasing counterfeit goods.

While Solgaard Design would like to help the victims of counterfeiting we’re not able to reimburse money used to purchase infringing goods since such goods were not bought from Solgaard Design (solgaard.co), nor do we assist with the resolution of disputes, including assistance with PayPal or credit card refunds.

Contact Solgaard Design to learn more about authorized dealers, as any product purchased outside of our exclusive sales network runs the risk of being counterfeit and is not guaranteed under warranty.

settings.title: What size of Laptop can fit in Lifepack?
settings.answer: The bag is designed to fit anything up to a 15" Laptop. In some cases, 17" laptops can also fit as long as the width is not more than 11.4L x 15.4W inches (29.5cm L /39cm W).

settings.title: How do I charge my devices with the powerbank?
settings.answer:
Fully charge via Micro USB cable by plugging into wall outlet with USB charging capacity. 2amp will charge in approx 6hrs, 1amp will take over 10hrs. 

This will give you approximately 6 charges for your smartphone if you do not see any sun. Press (1) Power button to check battery level. 5 LEDs = full battery. 1 = time to charge up! 

The upper large USB port will charge at 1a output, the lower USB port will charge at high speed 2.4a output.

settings.title: How does the Solar power work?
settings.answer:
The solar power generates power in sunlight best. However it can also generate power in daylight with non-direct sunlight.

In ideal sunlight it will generate approximately 450mAh per hour. This means that 1 hour = 25% charge for your smartphone. 4 hours will give the powerbank enough to give you a full charge on your phone.

The solar panel function is meant to act as a function to keep your powerbank topped up while you are on the go. The main charging function is by USB, and then the solar power keeps the level full depending how often you use it.

With 2 hours of good light per day, and a 50% top up of your phone per day you won’t need to think about plugging it in very often at all!

settings.title: How many times will the powerbank charge my phone?
settings.answer: 6 Full Charges for your smartphone using zero solar power. Every 4 hours of sunlight means 1 extra charge for your phone.

settings.title: How long does it take to charge the powerbank?
settings.answer:
2 hours of sunlight per day and a 50% top up to your phone means you’ll never need to plug your solarbank into a wall!

1 hour of sunlight = 25% charge for your smartphone

settings.subtitle: OUR MISSION: CLIMATE POSITIVE
settings.title: going beyond neutral
settings.content:
We inspire people to explore everything the world has to offer.

Our only mandate is that we give more than we take.

For every item sold, we save 229 plastic bottles from the ocean.

settings.title: Stopping the flow of plastic
settings.content: 80% of ocean plastic comes from rivers - let's stop it before it's in the deep sea.

settings.title: Our First Task
settings.content: For every item sold, we save 229 plastic bottles from entering the ocean.

settings.title: Our Partners In Removing Ocean Plastic
settings.richtext_1:
A collaborative and open-source initiative convening leading multinational companies to develop the first global network of ocean-bound plastic supply chains, convened by Lonely Whale.

The NextWave Plastics consortium member companies include Dell Technologies, Bureo, General Motors, Herman Miller, Humanscale, Interface, Trek Bicycle, HP Inc, IKEA, Solgaard, and CPI Card Group.
settings.richtext_2: An incubator for courageous ideas that drive impactful market-based change on behalf of our ocean.
settings.richtext_3: A certified, chain of custody traceable recycled plastic collected from coastal areas at risk for ocean plastic pollution.
settings.richtext_4: Established in 2020, the Solgaard Foundation champions the innovation and implementation of sustainable solutions, technologies, and infrastructures engineered to eradicate ocean plastic pollution and combat global environmental threats.
settings.heading_5: Solgaard Foundation x Ocean Plastic Filter
settings.richtext_5:
Currently in conceptual phase, the Ocean Plastic Filter is a mass-scale waste removal infrastructure seeking to eliminate three billion pounds of river- generated ocean plastic annually, making it the world’s largest waste collection system under development to-date.

Proposed for initial implementation in the most polluting river in the world, the Yangtze River in China, The Ocean Plastic Filter has the potential to eliminate 20-40% of plastic waste from polluting our ocean.

settings.title: Our ocean plastic cleanup initiatives
settings.richtext: We've partnered with different groups in The Philippines, Indonesia, and China who work with local teams in creating jobs for communities to collect ocean-bound plastic that can be upcycled into useful goods.

settings.title: Innovative Ecofriendly Materials
settings.content_1: Fabric made completely from ocean-bound plastic
settings.content_2: High impact and durable material made from ocean-bound plastic
settings.content_3: Durable hard-shell exterior of our luggage, made with recycled content
settings.content_4: Fabric constructed from excess luxury handbag material
settings.content_5: The frame on our Carry-On Closet is made from recyclable aluminum, one of the most repurposed metals on earth

settings.title: Let's end the plastic pollution crisis together

settings.subtitle: SOLGAARD IS PLASTIC NEGATIVE
settings.content: Our gear is made from ocean-bound plastic.
We are a design driven, sustainable luxury brand always ready for adventure. We enhance life on-the-go with premium gear for global citizens.

settings.title: We love to travel
settings.content: Our team is now based in NYC, with a few remote team members all over the world. We all get together at least once a year in a country that we all want to see next. So far: Amsterdam, Copenhagen, Palma de Mallorca, perhaps Tokyo next?

settings.title: We love the planet
settings.content: We believe in intentional, sustainable design. We produce products that improve travel life that don’t damage our planet.

settings.title: We are a community focused business
settings.content: We wouldn’t be here without our community of backers and customers. We make sure to keep that in mind every step of the journey.

We’re cleaning up our ocean and upcycling the material to make the best travel products on the planet. We aim to remove one million pounds of trash by the end of 2021, setting a new standard in sustainability.

Collaboration is at our core.

This all started when Adrian had an idea for a backpack with a solar panel, then he called Chris and they started jamming on ideas over late night calls. Six weeks later they launched Lifepack.

Initially our team was fully remote. Adrian was living in Spain, Chris in Vancouver, Ashley in San Francisco. Inspired by the remote lifestyle, we've managed to live lives of adventure while growing Solgaard.

The adventure took Adrian to New York, where our HQ is now based, along with most of the team.
settings.heading: Meet the team of dreamers, creators, and doers at Solgaard

settings.subtitle: HOW IT ALL BEGAN
settings.content: After a friend’s backpack had been stolen, Adrian Solgaard started talking with his friends about features to add into the perfect bag. In 2016 we launched Lifepack, and the world accepted it with open arms. Since then, we’ve continued to create great products people love.

The solar powered and anti-theft backpack: Fully featured with Solarbank with bluetooth speakers, retractable cable lock, drop-proof laptop storage and more, the Lifepack is built to join you on every journey so you can be ready for anything.

Launched on Kickstarter with 3,705 backers

settings.heading_1: Solarbanks - How they work, features, and compatibility
settings.content_1:
Q: How do I charge my devices with the powerbank?

A: Fully charge via a Micro USB cable by plugging into wall outlet with USB charging capacity. 2amp will charge in approximately six hours, 1amp will take over 10 hours. Press (1) Power button to check battery level. 5 LEDs = full battery. 1 = time to charge up! The upper large USB port will charge at 1a output, the lower USB port will charge at high speed 2.4a output.

 

Q: How long does it take to charge the powerbank?

A: Two hours of sunlight per day and a 50% top up to your phone means you’ll never need to plug your solarbank into a wall! One hour of sunlight = 25% charge for your smartphone

 

Q: How does the Solar power work?

A: The solar power generates power in sunlight best. However it can also generate power in daylight with non-direct sunlight. In ideal sunlight it will generate approximately 450mAh per hour. This means that 1 hour = 25% charge for your smartphone. Four hours will give the powerbank enough to give you a full charge on your phone. The solar panel function is meant to keep your powerbank topped up while you are on the go. The main charging function is by USB, and then the solar power keeps the level full depending how often you use it. With two hours of good light per day, and a 50% top up of your phone per day you won’t need to think about plugging it in very often at all.

 

Q: How many times will the powerbank charge my phone?

A: Five (5) full charges for your smartphone using zero solar power. Every four hours of sunlight means one extra charge for your phone.
settings.content_2:
Q: What size of Laptop can fit in Lifepack?

A: The bag is designed to fit anything up to a 15" Laptop. In some cases, 17" laptops can also fit as long as the width is not more than 11.4L x 15.4W inches (29.5cm L /39cm W).

Q: What is the capacity of the bag in litres?

A: The bag's capacity in litres is a little under 18 Litres. This is spread between the main workzone and lifezone, with the lifezone having 30% more space than the workzone.

Q: Can Lifepack fit a water bottle?

A: A water bottle can easily fit into the side pocket or be hooked onto the secure mounting point on the side of the bag.

Q: Is Lifepack and the Solarbank able to go through TSA?

A: We have traveled with this bag many times without any problems in the airport. TSA regulations allow for battery powered items to be carried with you in your carry on. All certifications will be passed to allow for safe travel and transport.

Q: How do I set the lock for the backpack?

A: The lock comes preset as 0-0-0, insert a pen or pin into the bottom part with the correct code and adjust the numbers to the code of your preference.(new version of Lifepack 2.0, Solgaard lock with hexagon shape)

Press and hold the lock when the correct code is entered, then reset while holding in the lock arm. When you release the lock with the new code that will become your new code. Automatically the lock is preset to 000.(old version of lock, Lifepack logo on lock)

Does this include a rainproof cover for the bag?
No it does not.
settings.heading_3: Dimensions - Measurements of the bag and solarbanks
settings.content_3:
Q: What are the dimensions of the Lifepack? 

A: 11.6 x 18.5 x 7 in (29.5 x 47 x 17.8 cm)

Q: What are the dimensions of the Solarbank?

A: 6.2 x 3.5 x 0.5 in (16 x 9 x 1.3cm)


Q: What are the dimensions of the Solarbank Boombox?

A: 6.2 x 3.5 x 2 in (16 x 9 x 5cm)

Q: How much does the Lifepack weigh?

A: Lifepack weighs 4lbs or 1.81kg. Solarbank and Solarbank Boombox each weighs 1.75lbs or 0.79kg.

settings.content_1:
What size of Laptop can fit in Lifepack?

The bag is designed to fit anything up to a 15" Laptop. In some cases, 17" laptops can also fit as long as the width is not more than 11.4L x 15.4W inches (29.5cm L /39cm W).

What is the capacity of the bag in litres?

The bag's capacity in litres is a little under 18 Litres. This is spread between the main workzone and lifezone, with the lifezone having 30% more space than the workzone.

Can Lifepack fit a water bottle?

A water bottle can easily fit into the side pocket or be hooked onto the secure mounting point on the side of the bag.

Is Lifepack and the Solarbank able to go through TSA?

We have travelled with this bag many times without any problems in the airport. TSA regulations allow for battery powered items to be carried with you in your carry on. All certifications will be passed to allow for safe travel and transport.

How do I set the lock for the backpack?

Press and hold the lock when the correct code is entered, then reset while holding in the lock arm. When you release the lock with the new code that will become your new code. Automatically the lock is preset to 000.

Does this include a rainproof cover for the bag?
No it does not.
settings.content_2:
How do I charge my devices with the powerbank?

If you choose to use your Lifepack Lite with a Solarbank, it fully charges via a Micro USB cable by plugging into wall outlet with USB charging capacity. 2amp will charge in approximately six hours, 1amp will take over 10 hours. Press (1) Power button to check battery level. 5 LEDs = full battery. 1 = time to charge up! The upper large USB port will charge at 1a output, the lower USB port will charge at high speed 2.4a output.

How long does it take to charge the powerbank?

Two hours of sunlight per day and a 50% top up to your phone means you’ll never need to plug your solarbank into a wall! One hour of sunlight = 25% charge for your smartphone

How does the Solar power work?

The solar power generates power in sunlight best. However it can also generate power in daylight with non-direct sunlight. In ideal sunlight it will generate approximately 450mAh per hour. This means that 1 hour = 25% charge for your smartphone. Four hours will give the powerbank enough to give you a full charge on your phone. The solar panel function is meant to keep your powerbank topped up while you are on the go. The main charging function is by USB, and then the solar power keeps the level full depending how often you use it. With two hours of good light per day, and a 50% top up of your phone per day you won’t need to think about plugging it in very often at all.

How many times will the powerbank charge my phone?

Five (5) full charges for your smartphone using zero solar power. Every four hours of sunlight means one extra charge for your phone.
settings.content_3:
What are the dimensions of the Lifepack?


A: 11.6 x 18.5 x 7 in (29.5 x 47 x 17.8 cm)

To operate the shelving system, pack with the shelf fully extended at home.
1) Open the suitcase door 90 degrees.
2) Lift the shelf up and hang from the suitcase handle. This can be done two ways; hanging from the back pocket on the shelf, or hanging from the clip on strap.
3) Pack each shelf to 70% full.
4) To close, lower the shelf into the suitcase, compress into place, and close the suitcase.

When you arrive at your destination, simply reverse these steps!

settings.heading: Shipping - Common questions re: Delivery
settings.content:
Items are shipped from our warehouse in Southern California within 1-2 business days of your order being placed.

Typical delivery in the continental US takes place within 2-5 business days for ground shipping. Hawaii and Alaska deliveries will arrive 4-6 days. Free shipping applies to continental US on orders over $100.

International orders are usually 6-9 business days. Duties are not included. It is the customers responsibility to pay for import duties or any local taxes.

If your product was sold out when you ordered, the button on the website says "pre-order" instead of "buy now". In this case, the product is on backorder and will typically ship within 8-12 weeks.

Customer is responsible for the re-route fee if delivery address needs adjustment. There is no guarantee we are able to adjust orders once en route.

How do I reset my lock?

The backpack lock is reset by entering the correct code (preset to 0-0-0) and pressing the pin on the bottom of the lock while resetting. 
Suitcase lock reset instructions are included with your suitcase: you enter the correct code (preset to 0-0-0) and flip the tab inside of the suitcase to position B, change the combo to your desired code, and flip the tab back to A.

Yes. Solarbanks have been approved to fly as cabin baggage for all airlines.

settings.heading: Warranty + Returns
settings.content:
To register your product warranty, please click here.

Returns

What is your return policy? (effective March 23, 2020)

We want you to enjoy your product as much as we enjoy upcycling ocean bound plastic. If you decide that you don’t love your Solgaard product, you may return your purchase within the first 30 days of receiving your product.

Items need to be returned in a like-new condition. Items that are damaged, unsanitary, dented, or scratched may be denied a return. Please return items with all accessories and packaging. If you do not, we may either deny the return, or allow a return with a nonrefundable deduction on your refund for the missing items.

If you received a discount or free item by purchasing multiple items together, you will lose that benefit if you do not return all items purchased.

Please note that you are unable to return merchandise obtained from a retailer other than www.Solgaard.co. Please return the product to the original retailer.

How do I make a return? 

To initiate your US return, please follow these steps:

-If you are returning a suitcase or backpack with a lock, you must reset lock to 0-0-0.

-Please visit our Returns Center here to start the refund process.

If your return is from outside of the US, please follow these steps:

-Email Customer Support at help@solgaard.co with your order details and the reason for return.

-Then our Customer Support team will provide you with an option to return the product at your expense or donate the item to the local charity of your choice.Proof of donation from a recognized charitable organization will be required before a refund is issued. 

What should I do if my product arrives damaged or defective?

If your product arrives with a manufacturing defect, we will gladly send you a replacement. Please contact Customer Support at help@solgaard.co with a brief description of the problem and picture of the defect - we will assist you with replacing your product. 

What if I receive a product that isn’t what I ordered? 

No worries - we’ll replace it with the correct product you ordered. Please keep the order in the original packaging and email our Customer Support team at help@solgaard.co. 

Our Customer Support may ask you to provide visual evidence (e.g photo, video) of the products to expedite the process.

What are the conditions for returning my product after the first 30 days? 

If you product becomes defective after the first 30 days, please refer to our Limited Ten Year Warranty. We do not refund products that are cosmetically damaged or have damaged due to normal wear and tear. If you believe your product has a manufacturing defect, please email our Customer Support team at help@solgaard.co. 

We do not accept returns that are:

-Obtained from a source other than Solgaard.co.

-Damaged by abuse or negligence (exposure to chemicals, caustic substances, open flame, high heat, sharp object, etc.)

-Damaged by misuse or activities other than the intended purpose

-Damaged by mishandling from airlines

When will I receive my refund?

Your refund will be processed as soon as the product is received by our Quality Assurance team who confirms it fits within our Return Policy or Limited Ten Year Warranty.

If you request a refund, the purchase price will be refunded to you using the original payment method, once we have received the returned item back and confirmed that it meets the conditions above. 

Once the return has been approved, it typically takes 1-2 business days for the refund to be made to your original payment method.

PayPal: You will typically see the funds in your account within 1-business day of the refund being initiated.

Credit/Debit card: It may take up to 10 business days for the refund to arrive in your account, depending on the card provider.

Do you offer repairs? 

We do not offer repairs. If you have a concern regarding a defective product, please email Customer Support with photos of your concern and we will do our best to address your concern and ensure you are happy with your outcome! 

Can I exchange my order?

We are unable to exchange the products you ordered online at the moment. However, you can return the unwanted product(s) for a refund and then place a new order.

Will you refund my shipping/taxes if I return my order?

We ship orders from the United States. Customers in the United States will have to pay for their return shipping. Customers in Europe/Rest of World will be required to pay their own return shipping if they want a refund on the product.



Solgaard Limited Ten Year Warranty 

Your Solgaard luggage is covered by a limited ten year warranty. This limited warranty gives you specific legal rights, and you may also have other rights which vary by state, province, or country.

If your product requires a minor repair, we may be able to provide you with a replacement part to have a local facility to do the repair. Call us for information and we will consider refunding the cost of the repair with a written quote from the repair facility.

-This Limited Ten Year Warranty extends to Solgaard luggage manufactured by Solgaard Design Inc. (“Solgaard”) and purchased directly from Solgaard or Solgaard’s authorized retailers. 

-Defects that do not impair the use of the bag (also known as “cosmetic damage”) is not covered under the Limited Ten Year Warranty.

-We guarantee your Solgaard luggage will be free of manufacturing defects for its intended use of transporting clothes and small personal objects. 

-A copy of the purchase receipt is required to determine if the warranty is valid.

-Solgaard Luggage is not intended for commercial or rental purposes.

If the luggage is under the limited warranty and needs servicing, we can replace or repair at our discretion. 

Where can I find my warranty number?

Your warranty registration number is your PO number. 

Who qualifies for warranty coverage?

Our warranties extend to the original owner or original recipient. 

Luggage

The Limited Ten Year Warranty covers manufacturing defects which include: wheels, handles, the locking mechanism, closure clasps, plastic outer case, zippers, missing rivets or screws. 

It does not cover: cosmetic damages due to normal wear and tear such as scuffs, scratches, dents, stains on the lining, or abuse from airline damage such as bent frames.

If you are locked out of your bag, this is not covered under the Limited Ten Year Warranty.  

If the bag is damaged by the airline, your first course of action should be to seek remediation from the airline. The most common instance of damage by an airline is likely to be a bending of a metal frame that surrounds the outer shell. 

Bags are covered under a Limited Two Year Warranty 

The Two Year LImited Warranty covers manufacturing defects which include zippers, hooks, handles, straps, buckles, exterior/interior fabric and stitching, and the lock.   

It does not cover cosmetic damage due to stains, spills, rips, color changes, slashes, surface tears in the fabric, and scratching of any metal parts. 

Accessories/Electronics are covered under a One Year Warranty 

The One Year Limited Warranty covers watches and Solarbanks which are guaranteed to be free of manufacturing defects and are guaranteed to function properly. Our accessories are not designed to be submerged in water. 

The Accessories One Year Limited Warranty does not cover cosmetic damage such as scratches on watch straps or face, cracks from dropping your accessory. Watch batteries are not covered under the One Year Limited Warranty and will need to be replaced approximately once a year.

settings.title: Premium, sustainable gear made entirely of ocean-bound plastics
Shore-Tex™
settings.content:
Starting in 2017, we began working to build a supply chain for commercial scale plastic collection from beaches and riverways.

Shore-Tex™ is fabric made entirely of ocean-bound plastic and can be found in the shell and lining fabric on our backpacks and accessories, and the lining fabric and closet system on our luggage.

settings.title: How is Shore-Tex™ made?
settings.text_3: The plastic is broken down into flakes and pellets.
settings.text_4: Then it’s stretched into yarn and wound up.
settings.text_5: The material is then woven into Shore-Tex™ Fabric.

What can I fit in the Sling?

settings.heading_2: Solarbanks - How they work, features, and compatibility
settings.content_2:
How do I charge my powerbank and my devices?

Fully charge via a Micro USB cable by plugging into a wall outlet with USB charging capacity. 2amp will charge in approximately six hours, 1amp will take over 10 hours. Press (1) Power button to check battery level. 5 LEDs = full battery. 1 = time to charge up! The upper large USB port will charge at 1a output, the lower USB port will charge at high speed 2.4a output.

How long does it take to charge the powerbank?

Two hours of sunlight per day and a 50% top up to your phone means you’ll never need to plug your solarbank into a wall! One hour of sunlight = 25% charge for your smartphone

How does the solar power work?

The solar power generates power in sunlight. However, it can also generate power in daylight with non-direct sunlight. In ideal sunlight it will generate approximately 450mAh per hour. This means that 1 hour = 25% charge for your smartphone. Four hours will give the solarbank enough to give you a full charge on your phone. The solar panel function is meant to keep your powerbank topped up while you are on the go. The main charging function is by USB, and then the solar power keeps the level full depending on how often you use it. With two hours of good light per day, and a 50% top up of your phone per day you won’t need to think about plugging it in very often at all.

How many times will the powerbank charge my phone?

Five (5) full charges for your smartphone using zero solar power. Every four hours of sunlight means one extra charge for your phone.

settings.content_1:
To operate the shelving system, pack with the shelf fully extended at home.
1) Open the suitcase door 90 degrees.
2) Lift the shelf up and hang from the suitcase handle. This can be done two ways; hanging from the back pocket on the shelf, or hanging from the clip on strap.
3) Pack each shelf to 60-70% full.
4) To close, lower the shelf into the suitcase, compress into place, and close the suitcase.

When you arrive at your destination, simply repeat these steps.

When you’re at home, it’s easy to get distracted by your phone, it’s easy to forget where you left your phone, and it’s easy to stay up all night watching TikToks.

By having a home for your phone, and giving it a little time-out, you can put it away and focus on spending time with your partner or friends while it’s charging.

We recommend putting the HomeBase in your living room to keep your phone away from your bedside at night, allowing for a better sleep.

• Internal amplification when combined with Boombox

• Made with sustainable, award winning materials

settings.heading_1: Bag + Features - Explanation of the bag
settings.content_1:
Q: What size of Laptop can fit in The Endeavor?

A: The bag is designed to fit up to a 16" Laptop.

Q: What is the capacity of the bag in litres?

A: The bag's capacity in liters 25 liters compact and 35 liters expanded. This is spread between the main workzone and lifezone, with the expandable zipper offering flexibility.

Q: Can Endeavor fit a water bottle?

A: A water bottle can easily fit into the side pocket or be hooked onto the secure mounting point on the side of the bag.
settings.content_2:
Q: What are the dimensions of the Endeavor? 

Non Expanded A: 6.5W x 19.5H x 11.5L in (16.5W x 49.5H x 29.2L cm)

Expanded A: 10.5W x 19.5H x 11.5L in (26.6W x 49.5H x 29.2L cm)

Q: What are the dimensions of the hanging closet? 

A: 10W x 27.5H x 7D in (25W x 70H x 18D cm) 

Q: What is the weight of the Endeavor? 

A: Backpack is 2.8lbs (1.27kg) and Closet is 0.75lbs (0.3kg)

settings.title: WHO ARE WE?
settings.content:
We are adventure-obsessed dreamers, with a passion for the ocean.

We make life more seamless and more sustainable.

settings.richtext_1: With every Solgaard purchase, your order is removing 229 Plastic Bottles from our ocean

settings.title: By removing 229 plastic bottles from the ocean for every purchase, we’re making big change accessible to everybody and showing the lasting impact that one small choice can have.
Our Partners In Removing Ocrean Plastic
settings.richtext_1:
A collaborative and open-source initiative convening leading multinational companies to develop the first global network of ocean-bound plastic supply chains, convened by Lonely Whale.

The NextWave Plastics consortium member companies include Dell Technologies, Bureo, General Motors, Herman Miller, Humanscale, Interface, Trek Bicycle, HP Inc, IKEA, Solgaard, and CPI Card Group.
settings.richtext_2: An incubator for courageous ideas that drive impactful market-based change on behalf of our ocean.
settings.richtext_3: A certified, chain of custody traceable recycled plastic collected from coastal areas at risk for ocean plastic pollution.
settings.richtext_4: Established in 2020, the Solgaard Foundation champions the innovation and implementation of sustainable solutions, technologies, and infrastructures engineered to eradicate ocean plastic pollution and combat global environmental threats.
settings.heading_5: Solgaard Foundation x Ocean Plastic Filter
settings.richtext_5:
Currently in conceptual phase, the Ocean Plastic Filter is a mass-scale waste removal infrastructure seeking to eliminate three billion pounds of river- generated ocean plastic annually, making it the world’s largest waste collection system under development to-date.

Proposed for initial implementation in the most polluting river in the world, the Yangtze River in China, The Ocean Plastic Filter has the potential to eliminate 20-40% of plastic waste from polluting our ocean.

settings.content_1:
The newest member of the Lifepack family, we took into consideration the need for a smaller backpack while not jeopardizing functionality.

With its sleek + minimalist design, drop proof laptop storage, and separate work/life compartments, you can commute to work, do some shopping, and then hop on a plane with the same bag. 

Made from our latest sustainable materials. Re-Luxe is a fabric constructed from the salvaged waste material of a luxury handbag company. Not to mention every purchase also removes 229 plastic bottles from entering the ocean.
